document.masterDocTitle: A Catalogue and Historical Study of the Odonata of Ecuador

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A Catalogue and Historical Study of the Odonata of Ecuador

caption.paragraph: FIGURE 88 b. ♀, Cannaphila vibex, ECUADOR, Napo Prov., small stream <1 km E of Río Sardinas Grande, 24 x 2013; photo. K. J. Tennessen.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Dasythemis esmeralda Ris, 1910
. Publ. Recs. ECU: Campos (1925) , Fraser (1946b) , Geijskes (1971) , Paulson (1983) , Davies & Tobin (1984) , Tsuda (1986 , 1991 ), Steinmann (1997b) , (H06), (P11), (H14); ES : * Ris (1910 — type series, 2 ♂♂ , Esmeralda, “from Selys”), Schmidt (1942) , Bridges (1993) ; OR : von Ellenrieder & Garrison (2011) ; SU : Donnelly (1998) . Also BOL , BRA , COL , GUF , PER , SUR , TTO , VEN : ( P11 ).
